amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt from the bill any regulations that pertain to nuclear reactor safety.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 115-1 to exempt from the bill's congressional approval requirement any rule pertaining to nuclear reactor safety standards in order to prevent nuclear meltdowns.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 231 (Roll no. 18).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 231 (Roll no. 18).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Nadler.
